question: Which of the following statements is Incorrect?
option1: Technology Upgradation fund scheme(TUFS) is a credit linked capital investment subsidy Scheme.
option2: China is the largest exporter of silk
option3: India is the largest exporter of Jute in the world.
answer: India is the largest exporter of Jute in the world.
explanation: Bangladesh is the largest Jute exporter in the world accounting to nearly 70% of global Jute exports.
